title.rendered: NEW Walls of Books + Behind the Scenes

content.rendered:
New Walls of Books Coming Soon!

We are busy pricing, sorting, and boxing up all the inventory for both the Ellijay, GA and Peachtree City, GA stores. Both locations will open in the month of October, so we have a lot to do! We will deliver all the inventory and shelving to their front doors. Then, our team arrives to set up shop. The store setup is a 3-4 day process, but there is weeks worth of effort that takes place behind the scenes (as you can see!).

excerpt.rendered: We are busy pricing, sorting, and boxing up all the inventory for both the Ellijay, GA and Peachtree City, GA stores.
